configs
===========
Config files for vim, tmux, bash alongside startup scripts for installations, symbolic links etc

### setup files

Repo should be cloned into \$HOME

#### startup.sh
To be run with sudo after new OS installation.
Installs Rmarkdown with tinytex, Anaconda etc.

#### sync.sh
Creates symbolic links for each of the config files.
